mapper.sql: id, city, imgurl, companysize, introduction, address, updatetime, checked, credit, companyname, companylicense, setuptime, registeredcapital, legalrepresentative, website, financingstage, industry
mapper.update: UPDATE company set credit=#{credit} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into company (id, city, imgurl, companysize, introduction, address, updatetime, checked, credit, companyname, companylicense, setuptime, registeredcapital, legalrepresentative, website, financingstage, industry ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companysize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companylicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setuptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{legalrepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financingstage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
